item.description:
Join Alina for this Charity Event!

Where: The Thomas Griswold House in Guilford

When: Sun, July 24th 2011 01:00PM-04:00PM What: New England's premier Craft Brewery Festival

Why: Raise money for SARAH (http://sarahfoundation.org/) and Spotlight breweries from all over the country (http://www.madisonwinexchange.com/main.asp?request=EVENTS&event=21)

The Madison Wine Exchange is proud to announce the 1st Annual From Hops To Hope Craft Beer Charity Festival at the Thomas Griswold House in Guilford. From Hops To Hope is to help raise money for The Sarah Foundation and its collective family of agencies, as well as the Trooper F Foundation that supports for the heartfelt loss of State Officer Mathew Richardson.

There will be over 40 microbreweries from all over the country pouring some of the greatest beer available. Below is only the beginning of the amazing beers that will be poured: Allagash Brewery, Berkshire Brewing Company, Blue Point Brewery, Brewdog, Brooklyn Brewery, Cavalary Brewing, Harpoon Brewery, Lagunitas Brewery, Long Trail Brewery, New England Brewing, Olde Burnside Brewery, Otter Creek Brewery, Riverhorse Brewing, Rogue Brewing, Samuel Adams, Saranac Brewery, Sierra Nevada, Southampton Publick House, Stone Brewing, Wolavers, and more.

Tickets are $30 which include admission, 5 drink tickets and 1 food ticket. Additional beer tickets will be sold for $1 and additional food tickets will be sold for $2. ALL PROCEEDS going to help those in need! Make sure to purchase your tickets today as NO TICKETS will be sold at the door!

For Normal Tickets go to: http://www.madisonwinexchange.com/sku19279.html

Special Thanks to Alina for hosting this event!  She will be the contact and can be reached at 608-432-5462 if you have trouble meeting up. 

Please Purchase your Tickets when RSVPing.  Since tickets are required on pre-sale, there should be NO "Maybe" RSVPs.
